EmailTemplate.description: This is the email sent to confirmed members who have submitted a 2nd set of paperwork
EmailTemplate.name: UPDATED Paperwork Resubmitted for Confirmed Member
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Service is Confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for submitting paperwork to confirm your service!
Now that we know a little bit more about you, we hope you’ll join in with the community of veterans on myIAVA, our virtual veterans hall. You’ll have access to exclusive veteran-only groups, and an opportunity to connect with others that share similar interests and experiences.
We also hope that you’ll Invite your friends to join. We want to reach out to every OIF/OEF/OND vet in the country and invite them to become part of our growing community. From San Diego to New York City, Dallas to Minneapolis - in small towns and large cities - our community is growing, and we hope you’ll invite your friends to join us too!
Thanks again, and we hope to chat with you soon!
Best,
Team IAVA
